segments.text: What would you like to order , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to try some Chinese food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We serve different styles of Chinese food here . But I'm not sure which one do you prefer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no idea . Could you recommend some to me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . Cantonese food is rather light , Beijing food is heavy , and Sichuan food is usually hot and spicy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . I'd like to have hot food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If so , I suggest you have a taste for Sichuan food . Most Sichuan dishes are spicy and hot , but they have different tastes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? So do you have some specialties ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Roasted Crispy Chicken and Spicy Beef are our specialties .
segments.speaker: S1
